sentences.en: A number of senior people were regarded as likely to occupy the now vacant post.
sentences.cn: 几位资深人士被认为有望填补现在空缺的职位。

sentences.en: Even quite small aircraft occupy a lot of space.
sentences.cn: 哪怕很小的飞机也要占很大的空间。

sentences.en: Family photos occupied almost the entire wall.
sentences.cn: 家人的照片差不多占了整个墙面。

sentences.en: Football occupies most of my leisure time.
sentences.cn: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

sentences.en: Frances invited them to occupy the upstairs of her home.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝邀请他们住在她家的楼上。

sentences.en: He hurried to take the suitcases and occupy himself with packing the car.
sentences.cn: 他急匆匆地去拎手提箱，忙着往车里装。

sentences.en: He occupies the house without paying any rent.
sentences.cn: 他住在这幢房子里，没有付一分钱房租。

sentences.en: I had other matters to occupy me, during the day at least.
sentences.cn: 至少白天我还有别的事情要做。

sentences.en: I would deserve to be pitied if I couldn't occupy myself.
sentences.cn: 如果我都不能让自己忙碌起来，那真是太可怜了。

sentences.en: It is forbidden to occupy basic farmland to develop horticulture or dig ponds to breed fish.
sentences.cn: 禁止占用基本农田发展林果业和挖塘养鱼.

sentences.en: It is forbidden to occupy basic farmland to develop horticulture.
sentences.cn: 禁止占用基本农田发展林果业。

sentences.en: It will not occupy much space.
sentences.cn: 它不会占很多地方.

sentences.en: Land is, in most instances, purchased by those who occupy it.
sentences.cn: 在大多数情况下，土地都是由其使用者购得。

sentences.en: Men still occupy more positions of power than women.
sentences.cn: 担任要职的男性仍然比女性多。

sentences.en: She occupied herself with routine office tasks.
sentences.cn: 她忙于办公室的日常工作。

sentences.en: Students occupied Sofia University on Monday.
sentences.cn: 星期一学生们占领了索非亚大学。

sentences.en: The bed seemed to occupy most of the room.
sentences.cn: 床似乎占去了大半个屋子。

sentences.en: The building was purchased and occupied by its new owners last year.
sentences.cn: 这幢房屋去年被新业主买下入住了。

sentences.en: We occupy a quality position in the market place.
sentences.cn: 我们在市场上居于高端地位。

sentences.en: You can't occupy yourself with dismal thoughts all the time.
sentences.cn: 不要终日陷在阴郁的思绪中。

sentences.en: You shall see the apartment that I told you you could occupy.
sentences.cn: 我带你到我刚才告诉你打算给你住的房间去.

words.tran_cn: 已占用的；使用中的；无空闲的

trans.tran_cn: 居住，占用，占领，担任，使忙碌，占…
trans.tran_en: to live or stay in a place

trans.tran_cn: 占， 占用， 占领； 使忙碌， 使从事
trans.tran_en: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it
